title: Filmmaking Script Workshop
short_description: Teaching the basics of script writing, and for the more advanced writers to do a practical small one page script which is able to get feedback immediately.
long_description: Filmmaking Society presents a Script Writing Workshop on Saturday 2:30PM, to teach you the tools necessary in making your own script and for those who are more advanced in their writing there is a chance to gain feedback from experienced teachers in a practical element of writing a one page script in the workshop.

schedule_organisation.name: Filmmaking Society
schedule_organisation.description: Uplifting people to create what they want!

schedule_venue.name: FAB0.23
schedule_venue.description: Based in the FAB, FAB0.23 is our workshop hub for WSAF
